original: atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṁ sukhassa ca
analyzed: atthaṅgamā nānatta saññānam amanasikārā ākāsa anañcāyatana saññā sahagatam sukhassa ca

original: pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
analyzed: pahānā pe catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati tasmin samaye phassaḥ hoti pe avikkhepaḥ hoti pe
ime dhammā kusalā

original: Tasseva arūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṁ sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ
analyzed: tassa iva arūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa kata ttā upacita ttā vipākam sabbaso rūpa saññāna

original: samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṁ
analyzed: samatikkamā paṭigha saññānaṃ atthaṅgamāḥ nānatta saññānaṃ amanasikārāḥ ākāsa anañca āyatana saññā sahagata

original: sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati, tasmiṁ samaye phasso
analyzed: sukhassa ca pahānā pe catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati tasmin samaye phasso
hoti pe avikkhepaḥ hoti pe
ime dhammā a byākatā
